channel.title: Dmitry Spirin on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Dmitry Spirin on Rusland 1

item.title: Тараканы! 3x
item.description: Engagement Lyrically and thematically, Тараканы! is your classic punk(rock) band. Watch and listen to Дезертир из армии зла (Deserter from the army of evil, 2019), Ни рыбы, ни мяса (Neither fish nor fowl, 2018), Я не верю (I don’t believe), Что я могу изменить?

item.title: Vinyl in Russia (and X-rays in the USSR)
item.description: Trailers The name of this trailer is aptly explained, Рок на костях = rock on the bones. No subtitles, and not very inviting. There’s also a Новый Трейлер (new trailer) and The Needle in my Ribs (an older one). Music history It’s best to watch the entire documentary.
